name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CopyText - Copy Text From Videos for FREE

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies text from YouTube videos in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button on the youtube page that lets you Easily Copy Text From Youtube Videos on user click.
